about_the_game:
Darklight is a small secret room escape decryption game
You need to play the role of an unknown woman who discovers the crimes of a mysterious organization in the dark basement

In the game, you will be trapped in the basement. Your goal is to find a 4-digit code to escape the crime scene successfully

At the same time, in this basement, you may encounter unknown monsters, and some unknown photos

Naked women, bundles, guns, mechanisms and so on


The game is absolutely silent, in the game you will not see a dialogue of characters

(so there is no language limit for this game.)

You need your own wisdom to escape this mysterious basement



The end of the game is not unique

There are 12 ordinary CGS and 3 hidden CGS in the game

Come on. Friend! Hope you can escape from this evil space successfully!

content_descriptors.notes:
This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Nudity or Sexual Content,rope

All characters involved in sexual content are over the age of 18.

name: DarkLight

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP/Vista/Windows 7/8/8.1/10 (32bit/64BIT)
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: intel Graphics
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0 Sound
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows XP/Vista/Windows 7/8/8.1/10 (32bit/64BIT)
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz+
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NIVIDIA OR AMD
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0 Compatible Sound +
